template.name: AAB_Gene2Synonym1
template.description: Show the synonyms and synonym source for a particular gene.

template.name: AAC_Genes2chromosome1
template.description: Show the genes located on a particular chromsome.

template.name: AAD_chromosomeLocation2genes3
template.description: Give the location of genes on a particular chromsome.

constraint.description: Give the location of genes on chromosome:

template.name: AAE_chromosomeLocation2genes2
template.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located between two points on a chromosome. Give the location of the exons.

query.name: AAE_chromosomeLocation2genes2
query.view: Chromosome.identifier Chromosome.exons.gene.name Chromosome.exons.gene.organismDbId Chromosome.exons.gene.identifier Chromosome.exons.transcripts.identifier Chromosome.exons.identifier Chromosome.exons.objects.start Chromosome.exons.objects.end Chromosome.exons.objects.strand

constraint.description: Show the genes, transcripts and exons located on chromosome:

template.name: AAF_gene2Transcripts2
template.description: Show the predicted transcripts and their chromosomal location for a particular gene.

query.name: AAF_gene2Transcripts2
query.view: Gene Gene.organismDbId Gene.identifier Gene.transcripts.identifier Gene.transcripts.objects.object.identifier Gene.transcripts.objects.start Gene.transcripts.objects.end Gene.transcripts.objects.strand

constraint.description: Show the predicted transcripts and chromosomal location for gene:

template.name: AAG_synonymGene2exonChromosomeLocations2
template.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons for a particular gene

query.name: AAG_synonymGene2exonChromosomeLocations2
query.view: Synonym.subject.name Synonym.subject.organismDbId Synonym.subject.chromosome.identifier Synonym.subject.exons.identifier Synonym.subject.exons.objects.start Synonym.subject.exons.objects.end

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons of gene:

template.description: Show the proteins annotated with a particular GO term.
